review1.title: Home Renovation: Kitchen, Living Room/Dining Room, Bedroom(s)
review1.body: Persian Top helped me tremendously with the construction and painting of my new apartment. Not only did they do a very good job, Abbas also gave me very good advice regarding the best solutions for certain problems in the apartment. I am very happy with the result!
review1.author: The Farmer

review2.title: Add-on: 30 m²; Yes; Flat roof
review2.body: Persian Top helped me tremendously with the construction and painting of my new apartment. Not only did they do a very good job, Abbas also gave me very good advice regarding the best solutions for certain problems in the apartment. I am very happy with the result!
review2.author: Fahrhad Sarabi

review3.title: Complete renovation including extension and new dormer window
review3.body: Abbas and his men made our renovation a great success. We simply have a new house! ...
review3.author: Remmert family

review4.title: Renovation of kitchen and hallway
review4.body: Persian Top has carried out the assignment fantastically. The work delivered is of high quality. ...
review4.author: Remmert family

footer.title: Persian Top
footer.about: You can also read more about us on Werkspot
footer.slogan: Your dream home with craftsmanship and quality.
footer.locationDesc: Visit us for all your renovation and extension projects. We are happy to help you realize your wishes with craftsmanship and quality.

q1.title: What is the lifespan of the extension?
q1.answer: We only use high-quality materials. Our technically innovative way of building on a solid foundation ensures that we can exclude the common mistakes. We can guarantee that our extensions will last as long as your home and that rot, water and connection problems are excluded with us.

q2.title: How long does it take to get exact price after quote submit?
q2.answer: It usually takes around a few minutes to calculate your exact price.

q3.title: Why do you only install on homes built from 1980 onwards?
q3.answer: Our prefab extension can technically only be placed on homes built after 1980. This has to do with the structural design of the home. Unfortunately, we cannot supply the interventions required to place an extension on older homes.

q4.title: Do I need a permit for an extension?
q4.answer: I am unable to configure the extension as I would like.

q5.title: In this case, please contact us and we will help you further.
q5.answer: In this case, please contact us and we will help you further.

faq.footer: If your question is not listed here, please contact us.
